targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 1.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p1"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 2.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p2"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 3.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p3"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 4.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p4"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 5.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p5"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 6.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p6"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 7.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p7"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 8.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p8"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 9.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p9"

    , ROUND(
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE ROUND(game_power) = 10.0) /
        (SELECT 1.0 * COUNT(id) FROM games WHERE game_power IS NOT NULL) * 100
    ) AS "p10"
;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  count(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,1d),
  count(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,7d),
  count(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,30d),
  count(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT (
        SELECT AVG(DAU.count)
        FROM (
                SELECT count(xid) AS "count"
                FROM users
                WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
                GROUP BY floor(extract(epoch from updated_at)/86400)*86400
                ORDER BY floor(extract(epoch from updated_at)/86400)*86400
        ) DAU
    ) / (
        SELECT AVG(MAU.count)
        FROM (
                SELECT count(xid) AS "count"
                FROM users
                WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
                GROUP BY floor(extract(epoch from updated_at)/2.592e+06)*2.592e+06
                ORDER BY floor(extract(epoch from updated_at)/2.592e+06)*2.592e+06
        ) MAU
    ) * 100.0

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  count(id) AS "count"
FROM games
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h),
  count(id) AS "count"
FROM games
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  count(id) AS "count"
FROM games
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND
  game_power > 0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(updated_at - created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
WHERE 
    status = 'started'
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(updated_at - created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
WHERE 
    status = 'started'
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  count(guild_xid) AS "count"
FROM servers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  servers.cached_name AS "server",
  $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,7d),
  count(games.id) AS "count"
FROM games
JOIN servers ON servers.guild_xid = games.guild_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  servers.cached_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
-- HAVING count(games.id) > 5
ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  count(id) AS "count"
FROM games
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND
  guild_xid = 304276578005942272
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h),
  count(id) AS "count"
FROM games
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND
  guild_xid = 304276578005942272
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    channel_settings.cached_name
    , $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,1h)
    , COUNT(games.id) AS "count"
FROM games
JOIN channel_settings
    ON channel_settings.channel_xid = games.channel_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  games.guild_xid = 304276578005942272 AND
  channel_settings.cached_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
    channel_settings.cached_name
    , $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,1d)
    , COUNT(games.id) AS "count"
FROM games
JOIN channel_settings
    ON channel_settings.channel_xid = games.channel_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  games.guild_xid = 304276578005942272 AND
  channel_settings.cached_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(updated_at - created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
WHERE 
    status = 'started'
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
    AND guild_xid = 304276578005942272
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(updated_at - created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
WHERE 
    status = 'started'
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
    AND guild_xid = 304276578005942272
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    channel_settings.cached_name
    , $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,1h)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(games.updated_at - games.created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
JOIN channel_settings
    ON channel_settings.channel_xid = games.channel_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  games.guild_xid = 304276578005942272 AND
  channel_settings.cached_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
    channel_settings.cached_name
    , $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,1d)
    , EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (AVG(games.updated_at - games.created_at))) / 60.0 AS "minutes"
FROM games
JOIN channel_settings
    ON channel_settings.channel_xid = games.channel_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  games.guild_xid = 304276578005942272 AND
  channel_settings.cached_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2
